tweet: We’re incredibly excited to see #IOTA be used as the #DLT protocol in another real-world project. Funded by the German Ministry of Transportation @BMVi with an 11m€ grant, @ETOGruppe is creating smart traffic infrastructure for safe autonomous driving.  https://t.co/eInEKjlI8S
